title: Areva
summary: Areva S.A. was a French multinational group specializing in nuclear power and renewable energy headquartered in Paris, France.[1] Before its 2016 corporate restructuring, Areva was majority-owned by the French state[2] through the French Alternative Energies and Atomic Energy Commission (54.37%), Banque publique d'investissement (3.32%), and Agence des participations de l'État (28.83%).[3] Électricité de France, of which the French government has a majority ownership stake, owned 2.24%; Kuwait Investment Authority owned 4.82% as the second largest shareholder after the French state.[4] The company was listed at the European stock exchange Euronext.
